Class Filesystem

java.lang.Object
se.kth.Filesystem
public class Filesystem extends Object
This handles the virtual file system used for build history

    Nested Classes

    Class
    Description
    static class 
    Filesystem.BuildData
    .json files, used to store the metadata about each build
    static class

    .log files, used to store the build log

    • sanitizeFilepath

      public String sanitizeFilepath(File file)
      Parameters:
      file - Input file path
      Returns:

    • getDirectory

      public Object getDirectory(String target) throws IOException
      Given the target directory, shows the content
      Parameters:
      target - eg name/repo/branch/commit.log
      Returns:
      If the file is a Log, then returns a LogData, otherwise returns an Array of type BuildData or File, where BuildData is a single build and File is a Directory.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • readFileToEnd

      public static String readFileToEnd(File file) throws IOException
      Helper function to read an entire file as a string
      Parameters:
      file - The input file that should be read
      Returns:
      The content of the file
      Throws:
      IOException
